alert.note: Alert for Dent (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 20 at 3:58PM CDT until August 20 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL DENT COUNTY... At 357 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Salem, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Salem... Turtle... Boss... Howes... Howes Mill... Darien... Stone Hill... Sligo... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
